div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/hl7TermMaintInfra where concept is-a MIF-ConceptRelationshipSymmetry

div.p: This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/hl7TermMaintInfra
CodeDisplayDefinition
MIF-ConceptRelationshipSymmetryGrouper code for MIF SupportedConceptRelationship.symmetry codes

description.value: Codes for use in the ext-mif-relationship-symmetry to capture V3 Model Interchange Format (MIF) SupportedConceptRelationship.symmetry values
